parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial port to use, for example /dev/ttyS0 or COM1

parameter.name: id
parameter.label: Id
parameter.description: Slave id. Also known as station address or unit identifier.

parameter.name: enableDiscovery
parameter.label: Discovery Enabled
parameter.description: When enabled we try to find a device specific handler. Turn this on if you're using one of the supported devices.

parameter.name: echo
parameter.label: RS485 Echo Mode
parameter.description:
Flag for setting the RS485 echo mode

This controls whether we should try to read back whatever we send on the line, before reading the response.

parameter.name: receiveTimeoutMillis
parameter.label: Read Operation Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout for read operations. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: flowControlIn
parameter.label: Flow Control In
parameter.description: Type of flow control for receiving

parameter.name: flowControlOut
parameter.label: Flow Control Out
parameter.description: Type of flow control for sending

parameter.name: timeBetweenTransactionsMillis
parameter.label: Time Between Transactions
parameter.description: How long to delay we must have at minimum between two consecutive MODBUS transactions. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: connectMaxTries
parameter.label: Maximum Connection Tries
parameter.description: How many times we try to establish the connection. Should be at least 1.

parameter.name: afterConnectionDelayMillis
parameter.label: Connection warm-up time
parameter.description: Connection warm-up time. Additional time which is spent on preparing connection which should be spent waiting while end device is getting ready to answer first modbus call. In milliseconds.

parameter.name: connectTimeoutMillis
parameter.label: Timeout for Establishing the Connection
parameter.description: The maximum time that is waited when establishing the connection. Value of zero means that system/OS default is respected. In milliseconds.
